name: Venice Maritime Cluster
goal:
Il Venice Maritime Cluster è un’associazione apartitica, autonoma e indipendente, senza scopo di lucro, a cui aderiscono associazioni e imprese e che persegue, sulla scorta della recente riforma delle Autorità di Sistema Portuale introdotta dalla normativa italiana - D.Lgs. n. 169 del 04 Agosto 2016, le finalità di rappresentare le imprese e le associazioni di categoria operanti a vario titolo nel settore dell’economia marittima e portuale di Venezia.
.
The Venice Maritime Cluster is an autonomous and independent, non-profit, association of companies and companies, which, following the recent reform of the Port System Authorities introduced by Italian Law - D.Lgs. nr. 169 of 4 August 2016, aims to represent companies and trade associations operating in various fields in the marine and port economy of Venice
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EUROPEAN TRANSPORT LAW; PORT MANAGEMENT & MARITIME LAW; INTERNATIONAL TRADE LAW; DRY BULK SHIPPING; CUSTOMS LAW; FOREIGN POLICY AND SECURITY; PROTECTION FOR THE ENVIRONMENT; REGULATION (EC) 561/2006; REGULATION (UE) 352/2017
